thread.title: More law students on horizon as new school opens in Australian Technology Park in Sydney.
thread.title_full: More law students on horizon as new school opens in Australian Technology Park in Sydney. | afr.com

author: Katie Walsh
title: More law students on horizon as new school opens in Australian Technology Park in Sydney.
text:
Top Education Institute: the latest to offer a bright future to would-be law students Cole Bennetts Share on twitter by Katie Walsh Dream big, the website promotes. Do law!
What Australia's newest law school does not promote is the difficult job market for law graduates in the post-global financial crisis landscape.
The Sydney City School of Law is pitching itself as an exciting, new institution for the technology generation.
"While one might think of law as an older style profession, the reality is in a world that is increasingly conflicted, where rules and regulations are part of what we have to deal with â€¦ students at [the law school] will not only prepare for a future, they will help create the new future," dean of the law school Professor Eugene Clark says in a video message.
"Particularly if you are a student who likes to be around the buzz, the excitement, of the creation of a new institution... [it will] be a very exciting place to be."
Run by Top Education Institute, it will begin offering classes from 2016 and is located in the Australian Technology Park in Sydney.
There are more than 40 law schools in the nation.
